name: Castle Key
description: A large iron key with the castle crest engraved on the handle. It feels heavy and important.

name: Treasury Key
description: A golden key that gleams in the light. Only the castle guard would have something like this.

name: Rusty Dungeon Key
description: An old, corroded key covered in rust. It looks like it hasn't been used in years.

name: Hidden Mechanism
description: Not really an item, but a disguised lever that opens secret passages. It crumbles after one use.

name: Safe Room Key
description: A sturdy brass key. Perfect for securing a room while you rest.

name: Master Skeleton Key
description: A mysterious key that seems to shimmer and change shape. Legends say it can open any lock.

name: Glowing Crystal Orb
description: A perfectly spherical crystal that pulses with inner light. It feels warm to the touch and hums with magical energy.

name: Elder's Token
description: A small wooden token carved with ancient symbols. The village elders give these only to those who have proven themselves worthy.

name: Vault Key Fragment (1 of 3)
description: Part of a broken key. It looks like two more pieces are needed to complete it.

name: Complete Vault Key
description: A fully assembled key forged from three fragments. It radiates power.
